articles.description: The latest US market share report shows the Android/iOS war might be over here. But salvation could come from an unlikely source.
articles.content: The latest US smartphone market share report from Counterpoint Research makes for grim reading in the battle of Android versus iOS. Apples iPhone accounted for a massive 55% of the market in Q2 2023,… [+7655 chars]
